mods.abstract: Obelisk of Sesostris I at Heliopolis (Middle Kingdom Dynasty XII); Egyptian man with his horse drawn cart before the Obelisk of Sesostris I, ca. 1971-1926 B.C.E., inscribed with a single column of hieroglyphs and cartouches of Sesostris I; village of Heliopolis and trees (background); "No 39_Obélisque d'Héliopolis à Matariah P. Sebah, Phot:" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
